notes.text:
This update for perl-DBI fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-20919: Fixed a NULL profile dereference in dbi_profile (bsc#1176764).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in the DBI module before 1.643 for Perl. The hv_fetch() documentation requires checking for NULL and the code does that. But, shortly thereafter, it calls SvOK(profile), causing a NULL pointer dereference.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
